title: Torrent Finder 1.1a (searches torrent sites for torrents)
description:
Torrent Finder 1.1a

This is the new update to my torrent finder program released here: http://www.demonoid.com/torrents/details/253594

This program requires the microsoft .NET framework v2.0. If you get an error running the program, you probably need to download the framework which can be found here: <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&DisplayLang=en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&DisplayLang=en</a>

Onto the technical details:

Features:

-searches these sites for torrents (you can disable any one of them)

	- Isohunt
	- TorrentPortal
	- Demonoid
	- TorrentBox
	- MyBitTorrent
	- ThePirateBay
	- TorrentMatrix
	- TorrentTyphoon (new) -> Engine that searches 6-8 sites.
	- Seedler (new)
	- BtJunkie (new)
	- Mininova (new)
	- Meganova (new)
	- Torrentspy (new)

	for a total of around 20 sites.

        - disabled sites are now hidden
        - remembers old settings


Please Give any suggestions / constructive criticism.
